text: Sarov () is a closed town in Nizhny Novgorod Oblast, Russia. It was known as Gorkiy-130 (Горький-130) and Arzamas-16 ().SarovLabs. Creation of Nuclear Center Arzamas-16 Until 1995, it was known as Kremlyov/Kremlev/Kremljov (). In 2002, the population was 87,652. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Nizhny Novgorod Oblast
title: Sarov
